p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_97: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_100: We provide a comprehensive 3-year curriculum to enable residents to learn all medical dermatology and become proficient in dermatology surgery. We provide training, mentorship & support that allows for seamless transition into dermatology fellowships, academic practice, or private practice. We aim to produce competent and compassionate physicians who are prepared to be local and national leaders. We are committed to diversity, inclusion and equity at our program, department and institution.
